New Records: Cape Verde's biggest ever Afcon victory.
Key Match Events: Bebe opened the scoring with a free-kick from 40 metres out.
Ryan Mendes scored the second goal six minutes after half-time.
Kevin Pina sealed the victory with a strike into the top corner in the 69th minute.
Geny Catamo's penalty decision was reversed after VAR review.
Post-Match Reflections: Ryan Mendes commented on the team's belief and hard work after reaching the last 16.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Cape Verde is now certain to finish on top of Group B after defeating Ghana 2-1 in their opening game.
